statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age, income FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, income FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE income > 50000 AND address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE income BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE age <= 25 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, income FROM customer_data WHERE income < 30000 AND customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_activities FROM activities GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, count(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM activities GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_activities > 1;
SELECT customers.name, activities.activity_type FROM customers JOIN activities ON customers.customer_id = activities.customer_id ORDER BY customers.name ASC, activities.activity_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customers.first_name, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE customers.email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT c.first_name, t.amount, sa.activity_description FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN suspicious_activity sa ON t.transaction_id = sa.transaction_id WHERE sa.status = 'suspicious' ORDER BY sa.activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT c.id, c.name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 100 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount, shipping_address FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, payment_method FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 3
